definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

pinyin: Luo2 mo2 nuo4 suo3 fu1 shan1 ji3

sentences.english: In fact, he wrote his dissertation on the midocean ridge.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，他的博士论文就是关于中央山脊的研究。

sentences.english: Surrounded by a jagged mountain ridge.
sentences.chinese: 它被锯齿形的山脊所环绕。

sentences.english: Suddenly, the ridge itself seemed to burst into flames.
sentences.chinese: 突然，山脊自己也似乎迸射出火焰。

sentences.english: Rammick lives high on a ridge in a 400-home subdivision.
sentences.chinese: 拉米克住在高耸的山脊上一片有400户人家的地方。

sentences.english: Bandai Namco will deliver lounges for Tekken, Ridge Racer, and Soul Calibur.
sentences.chinese: 万代游戏将提供休息室的铁拳，山脊赛车，并刀魂。

sentences.english: Furrows and ridges on the surface were caused by deforming ice.
sentences.chinese: 现在火星表面的梨沟和山脊的就是冰层运动的结果。

sentences.english: But as the moon lifted off the ridge it gathered firmness and authority.
sentences.chinese: 但是，当月亮升至山脊之上时，它聚足了坚定与威望。

sentences.english: The peak has now been climbed from almost all ridges.
sentences.chinese: 现在，几乎从所有的山脊人们都已攀登过乔戈里峰了。

sentences.english: A sharp, narrow mountain ridge or spur.
sentences.chinese: 陡峭，狭窄的山脊或横岭。

sentences.english: Just beyond, snow and ice crest a pink mountain. Ahh …
sentences.chinese: 远处，皑皑冰雪覆于山脊，化作了粉色山躯的冠饰。

sentences.english: Bildad had halted upon the shoulder of the first mountain spur.
sentences.chinese: 比尔达把马车停在第一道山脊的隆起部。

sentences.english: They defeated the weakest of their enemies first, the Ridgers.
sentences.chinese: 首先被击溃是一个弱小的敌人，山脊部落。

sentences.english: The tracks of mountain goats polka-dotted the dust ridge.
sentences.chinese: 山羊的踪迹使土灰色的山脊上布满着斑斑点点。

sentences.english: The whole ridge, up on the east, is black with horsemen.
sentences.chinese: 东边高处，整个山脊上黑压压的全是骑兵。

sentences.english: The moon has a tall ridge running along its equator, like a walnut's seam.
sentences.chinese: 土卫八有高的山脊沿着其赤道，像胡桃木的接缝一样。

sentences.english: Badaling is the best place to see the Great Wall snaking across the mountain ridges.
sentences.chinese: 八达岭是观看长城沿山脊蜿蜒行走最好的地方。

definition: halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
topography of a mountain/features of a mountain
